testcase.name: Check that user can delete an item from the cart by verifying that 'Your Amazon Cart is empty'
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Amazon homepage...............................................passed When I enter "WD 5TB My Passport" and submit in the search field............passed And I click on the product 'WD 5TB My Passport Portable External Hard Drive, Black - WDBPKJ0050BBK-WESN'.passed And I click on 'Add to Cart'................................................passed And I navigate back to previous window......................................passed And I click on 'Add to Cart'................................................passed And I click on cart button..................................................passed Then I verify that the the text, Subtotal (2 items):, is displayed..........passed
